verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Holy, holy, is the lamb.
He is the great I Am without end.
I know that my Redeemer liveth,
And someday soon, I'll be like Him.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I'm singing glory, glory, hallelujah.
I will praise His holy name,
For He brought me out of bondage,
And He set me free again.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Santo, Santo es el Se√±or.
El es el gran Yo Soy, sin fin.
Y mi Redentor si vive.
Y pronto yo sere como el.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Oh gloria, gloria aleluya.
Alabad Su nombre si,
Me saco de las tinieblas y me libro a mi.
